sentences.en: A few days after his collapse he was sitting up in bed.
sentences.cn: 他病倒后没过几天就又能在床上坐起来了。

sentences.en: After a long evening of partying he looked tired.
sentences.cn: 纵情狂欢了一夜后，他看起来累了。

sentences.en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentences.cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentences.en: After his elevation to the papacy, he reigned for two years.
sentences.cn: 他升任教皇后在位两年。

sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: After the pain of defeat passes, England have some thinking to do.
sentences.cn: 失败的痛苦过去以后，英国人应该认真反思一下。

sentences.en: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.cn: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.en: after you, Mr Pritchard.
sentences.cn: 普里查德先生，您先请。

sentences.en: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.cn: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.en: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.cn: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.en: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.cn: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.cn: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.en: I rang and told her I couldn't come after all.
sentences.cn: 我打电话告诉她我还是不能来。

sentences.en: Jem was full of beans after a long sleep.
sentences.cn: 杰姆好好睡了一觉之后又变得精力充沛了。

sentences.en: Kernaghan missed the United game after he ricked his neck.
sentences.cn: 克纳汉因为扭伤脖子而错过了联赛。

sentences.en: Markov died after being struck by a poison dart.
sentences.cn: 马尔科夫身中毒镖而亡。

sentences.en: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.cn: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

sentences.en: She dropped out after 20 kilometres with stomach trouble.
sentences.cn: 20公里后她因胃痛而退出了比赛。

sentences.en: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentences.cn: 她患上严重的心脏病后安装了心脏起搏器。

sentences.en: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.cn: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.en: the pigs were after breaking loose.
sentences.cn: 那些猪就要挣脱了。

sentences.en: These chaps know their stuff after seven years of war.
sentences.cn: 7年的战争过后，这些家伙都成了作战行家。

sentences.en: They were spotted after three hours adrift in a dinghy.
sentences.cn: 他们在小舢板上漂浮了3个小时后才被发现。

sentences.en: Tomorrow. Or the day after.
sentences.cn: 明天。或者后天。

sentences.en: you are my counsellor, after all.
sentences.cn: 你毕竟是我的顾问。

sentences.en: Your name comes after mine in the list.
sentences.cn: 在名单上你的名字在我的后面。

sentences.en: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.cn: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

words.tran_cn: 最后的；最后部的；最靠近船尾的

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指有营业执照的场所）正常工作（或开放）时间之后

trans.tran_en: in the years after the time that has been mentioned
when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something
when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

trans.tran_cn: 在…之后，在（某人）后面，寻找，追捕，仅次于，虽然，鉴于，模仿，与…对比，接连
trans.tran_en: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something
when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something
